content: round coasters a simple knits design need a fast gift or quick items to make for a fundraiser here s a coaster pattern i came up with for a fundraiser this round coaster is made with only three rounds it is fast-to-crochet in any worsted weight cotton such as sugar & cream that s what i used for the pictured coaster one ball of yarn should make a bunch of coasters or it s a good way to use up any leftovers from dishcloths or other projects my starting instructions may be a bit unfamiliar to some i don t start by joining a chain into a circle to save time and have a tighter center i start by materials crocheting a chain the height of the first stitch 12 yards of cotton worsted weight yarn then i work the first round in the first chain the size h 5 mm crochet hook one farthest from your hook and slip_stitch to the yarn needle top of the chain to join it into a circle if your first stitch is too tight to accommodate all of the finished size 4 5 across stitches you need try making it a little looser the next time key chain = chain double_crochet = double_crochet x = times round 1 ch6 in beginning loop work 1 double_crochet ch2 9x then slip_stitch to top of beginning chain to join round 2 ch3 work 2dc in first ch2 space double_crochet in next double_crochet work 2dc in next ch2 space repeating around slip_stitch to top of ch3 round 3 ch4 and double_crochet in the same stitch ch1 skip 1 double_crochet in next double_crochet work 2 double_crochet repeating around slip_stitch to ch3 © 2007 vicki mikulak all rights reserved for personal non-commercial use only cut yarn weave in all ends trim off excess yarn questions simple knits@yahoo com revised 8/16/2014
